name: macOS Monterey UI Kit for Figma
description:
With Apple's latest release of macOS Monterey now available, I'm really excited to share a UI kit for Figma that includes many of the OS-level components needed to get started with any project for the Mac. ğŸ–¥


Months of fun, nerdy, creating went into this and every component has been recreated and refactored to now work even better with Figma's Variants and updated Auto Layout features.
